resources.string: Manchos Pets store is the most complete online store for canine pets created by pet lovers for pet lovers. We are the online pet store with the largest variety of products and services at home in Bogot√° (Colombia), we have more than 4,000 products (food, natural diets, snacks, medicines, hygiene and accessories). We reached the whole city. We have deliveries the same day, if you order before 5pm it will arrive the same day. We have all payment methods: online payments, cash on delivery, dataphone. and most importantly with very good prices. Manchos Pets is for everyone ! In our store you will find products from the economic range to the super premium. A whole universe of solutions for your pet.

At Manchos Pets we support and collaborate organically and actively with animal rescue and adoption houses, which is why we donate a percentage of our monthly sales to these causes. For us, the integrity and well-being of pets is paramount.
